entry.title: Profile
entry.content:
B.S. student
School of Electrical and Computer Engineering
Ulsan National Institue of Science and Technology (UNIST)
Ulsan, South Korea.
hmg0228@gmail.com

Interests

  • High-performance big data computing
  • Operating system design and implementation
  • Computer system security

Education

  • Currently, B.S. Computer Science and Engineering,
    Ulsan National Institue of Science and Technology (UNIST)
    March 2013 -

Publications

  • Jinsu Park, Myeonggyun Han, Woongki Baek, Quantifying the Performance Impact of Large Pages on In-Memory Big-Data Workloads, IEEE International Symposium on Workload Characterization (IISWC 2016) Providence, Rhode Island, USA, Sept. 2016.

Experience

  • Internship
    • Computer Architecture and Systems Lab, UNIST
      Advisor: Woongki Baek
      December 2014 -
  • Campus Activity
    • President, HeXA (a computer security research group) at UNIST
      March 2014 - March 2015
    • Staff, Security One Forum
      November 2014 - March 2015
    • Student Mentor, 1th Super computing youth camp at UNIST
      August 2015

Awards

  • 2014 Korea Whitehat Contest :: Finalist (HeXA)
    • Held by Ministry of National Defense and National Intelligence Service
    • 5th place at preliminary contest

Personal Projects

  • TODO
